artist: Artist: Adachi Ginkō; Publisher: Hasegawa Sumi
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; two Western soldiers at center with grey clouds in front of a wall behind men; running Western soldiers at right; two dead Japanese figures with umbrella lying at LRC; green border; sheets attached together
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Enemy Soldiers Fleeing after They Themselves Destroyed Magong Fortress, Great Victory for Our Forces
